page.title: 12 PASTIMES AND ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: THE CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL LIKE TO PLAY MARBLES,CRICKET,FOOTBALL AND RACING AT PLAYTIMES.IN THE EVENINGS OR AT WEEKENDS THEY PLAY OUT ON THEIR BIKES, SKATES OR IN OTHER PEOPLES GARDEN.THEY ENJOY GOING TO THE SWIMMING BATHS AND GOING FISHING.IF THEY GO OUT WITH THEIR PARENTS THEY GO TO THE TOWN SHOPPING, TO THE CINEMA,THE SEASIDE OR ICE- SKATING.THEY OFTEN GO TO VARIOUS CLUBS IN THE EVENING FOR A DRINK AND TO DANCE.IN THE WINTER THEY TEND TO STAY INDOORS AND PLAY WITH THEIR TOYS OR WATCH T.V. OR VIDEO.EVERY CHILD HAS AT LEAST 1 T.V. AND 58% HAVE A VIDEO.MOST WEEKENDS THEY HIRE A FILM TO WATCH AT HOME.
